players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked and saddened by Diana's sudden death. Let's all try to work together to figure out who could have done this."
Charlie: "Let's focus on gathering information and not jumping to conclusions. We don't know who Diana was investigating or what she found out."

You: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we may have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. I remember Diana mentioning she had been noticing some strange activities in the village lately. Could this be related to her death?"

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
